h4.a: Pick up materials dates and procedures

div.div: Lunch pickups are 11:00 am Monday through Friday at the High School!

div.a: Class of 2022 Sophomores and Class of 2024 8th graders

br.p: Monday, 4th from 12pm - 1pm at the front entrance of the high school.

The Brimfield CUSD #309 Board of Education will be holding two Special Board Meetings. Meeting dates are Tuesday, April 28, 2020, and Tuesday, May 5, 2020. There is also an Extra-Curricular Committee Meeting scheduled for April 30, 2020.
If you are interested in participating in Cheer in the 2020-2021 season, please fill out the attached form

Due to the current pandemic crisis we have decided to postpone the drawing / dance to July 18th, location and times will be the same.
Tickets are still available!!!
Click the link for information online music learning
